text: Billy Porter (born September 21, 1969) is an American actor and singer. Porter won the 2013 Best Actor in a Musical for his role as Lola in Kinky Boots at the 67th Tony Awards. In 2014 Porter won the Grammy Award for Best Musical Theater Album for Kinky Boots. He currently stars in the television series Pose for which he was nominated for a Golden Globe Award and won the 2019 Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Lead Actor in a Drama Series. In 2021, he confirmed he had been living with HIV for 14 years. ==References== Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Pittsburgh Category:Singers from Pittsburgh Category:People with HIV/AIDS
title: Billy Porter
